features: ◆ FASHION STYLE ◆ Fancy and sophisticated Desert Cactus necklace will definitely make a bold statement. White pearl pendant necklace is best to describe your unique personality. The resilient cactus necklace is best to include in your necklace collection. 925 pendant necklaces for women is perfect to pair with your favorite dress.

◆ PACKAGING GIFT ◆ This Aeravida sterling cactus necklace are gracefully packed and ready to gift to your loved ones. Mother of pearl necklaces is the best gift for friends, sisters, mother, wife, daughters, girlfriend, lovers, or fiancé, on Thanksgiving, Christmas, Birthdays, or Anniversary.

Sleek and trendy Desert Cactus necklace is light in weight and comfortable to wear. A resilient cactus necklace is modern, classic, and unique. 925 Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace will make you more stylish and charming on any special occasion.
Material: Sterling Silver | Trademark: Stamped 925| Cactus Plant sterling necklace is made up of pure and high-quality sterling silver and is best to give you the perfect party look.

Chain Type: Cable | Clasp Type: Round Spring Ring| Weight: 4.5 grams | Stone: Mother of Pearl | Color: White | Finish: Shiny, Polished | Design Measurements: 19 mm (0.75 in) wide x 37 mm (1.46 in) long (including bail) | Necklace Length: 18 in long x 0.75 mm thick.

Sterling Silver is a composition of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5%, copper. Exposure to any chemical and having high body acidity can cause a green or oxidized effect reaction. Keep your skin dry when wearing jewelry. If the piece begins to tarnish, clean it immediately.
description: A resilient plant that flourishes in the harshest of environments, the cactus is well known for its adaptability. This fact has inspired artisan Goong of Thailand to create this stunning necklace featuring this amazing plant. Made of fine sterling silver and accented with a mother of pearl inlay, this pendant is then set on an 18-inch sterling silver cable chain. Making for a stylishly unique necklace that you can wear with just about anything. PLEASE NOTE: The handcrafted nature of this product will produce minor differences in design, sizing and weight. Variations will occur from piece to piece, measurements may vary slightly.
works directly with gifted and talented Artisans from all over the world. At the core of our philosophy is fair trade and fostering a sustainable future for our Artisans.

Artisan Goong is a very successful jewelry designer who has over 35 years of experience. She was born in the city of Chiang Rai, in northern Thailand. Her parents were farmers and worked very hard to support her and her siblings.
